name: GetAppUsageMetrics
description:
Retrieve usage metrics for a specific app over a time range.

This tool is used to obtain usage metrics for a specific app within a defined time period. It requires an app management API token and the 'boards:read' scope. Useful for monitoring app performance and usage patterns.

parameters.name: start_date_utc
parameters.description: Start date of the period in UTC format (e.g., 2024-12-31).

value_schema.description: Start date of the period in UTC format. For example, 2024-12-31.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date of the period in UTC format, e.g., 2024-12-31.

value_schema.description: End date of the period in UTC format. For example, 2024-12-31.

parameters.name: application_id
parameters.description: The ID of the app to retrieve metrics for. Provide a valid app ID to obtain usage data.

value_schema.description: ID of the app to get metrics for.

parameters.name: group_data_by_period
parameters.description: Specify the time period for grouping data: 'DAY', 'WEEK', or 'MONTH'.

value_schema.description: Group data by this time period.
